description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯政治家和高级军官，现任俄罗斯联邦安全会议秘书长，曾任俄罗斯国防部长。图瓦、乌克兰混血。
description.en: Russian politician and army general, currently serving as the Secretary of the Security Council of Russia, and former Minister of Defence of the Russian Federation. He is of Tuvan and Ukrainian descent.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯政治家，现任俄罗斯总统。
description.en: Russian politician, current President of Russia.

en: Security Council of the Russian Federation

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯总统主持的，商讨和决定国家安全战略的机构。
description.en: A consultative body of the Russian president that works out the president's decisions on national security affairs.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯政治家，谢尔盖·绍伊古的前任俄罗斯联邦安全会议秘书长。
description.en: Russian politician, predecessor of Sergey Shoigu as Secretary of the Security Council of Russia.

en: Ministry of Defence of the Russian Federation

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯联邦的政府部门，负责国防事务。
description.en: The ministry of the Russian government responsible for defence affairs.

zh-cn: 阿纳托利·爱德华多维奇·谢尔久科夫

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯政治家，谢尔盖·绍伊古的前任俄罗斯国防部长。
description.en: Russian politician, predecessor of Sergey Shoigu as Minister of Defence of Russia.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯政治家，谢尔盖·绍伊古的继任俄罗斯国防部长。
description.en: Russian politician, successor of Sergey Shoigu as Minister of Defence of Russia.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯莫斯科州的最高行政长官职位。
description.en: The highest executive office in Moscow Oblast, Russia.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯政治家，谢尔盖·绍伊古的前任莫斯科州州长。
description.en: Russian politician, predecessor of Sergey Shoigu as Governor of Moscow Oblast.

nodes.id: 安德烈·尤里耶维奇·沃罗比约夫

zh-cn: 安德烈·尤里耶维奇·沃罗比约夫

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯政治家，谢尔盖·绍伊古的继任莫斯科州州长。
description.en: Russian politician, successor of Sergey Shoigu as Governor of Moscow Oblast.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of Russia.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯政治家，接替谢尔盖·绍伊古成为统一俄罗斯党领导人。
description.en: Russian politician, who succeeded Sergey Shoigu as the leader of the United Russia party.

nodes.id: 俄罗斯联邦紧急情况部

zh-cn: 俄罗斯联邦紧急情况部

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯联邦的政府部门，负责处理紧急情况和救灾。
description.en: The ministry of the Russian government responsible for emergency situations and disaster relief.

nodes.id: 克拉斯诺亚尔斯克理工学院

zh-cn: 克拉斯诺亚尔斯克理工学院

description.zh-cn: 谢尔盖·绍伊古的母校，后并入西伯利亚联邦大学。
description.en: The alma mater of Sergey Shoigu, later merged into Siberian Federal University.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯图瓦共和国的城镇，谢尔盖·绍伊古的出生地。
description.en: A town in the Tuva Republic, Russia, and the birthplace of Sergey Shoigu.

en: Communist Party of the Soviet Union

description.zh-cn: 苏联的创始及唯一执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 谢尔盖·绍伊古的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Sergey Shoigu.

description.zh-cn: 谢尔盖·绍伊古的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of Sergey Shoigu.

description.zh-cn: 谢尔盖·绍伊古的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of Sergey Shoigu.

description.zh-cn: 谢尔盖·绍伊古的姐姐，曾任俄罗斯国家杜马议员。
description.en: Sister of Sergey Shoigu, former deputy of the State Duma of Russia.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯陆军大将，现任俄罗斯武装力量总参谋长。
description.en: Russian army general, current Chief of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Russia.

description.zh-cn: 2022年2月24日，俄罗斯对乌克兰发动的全面战争，是俄乌战争的重大升级。
description.en: On 24 February 2022, Russia launched a full-scale invasion of Ukraine, a major escalation of the Russo-Ukrainian War.

description.zh-cn: 东欧国家，谢尔盖·绍伊古母亲的故国。
description.en: A country in Eastern Europe, the motherland of Sergey Shoigu's mother.

nodes.id: 本·华莱士 (英国政治人物)

zh-cn: 本·华莱士 (英国政治人物)

description.zh-cn: 英国政治家，曾任国防大臣。在2022年俄罗斯入侵乌克兰前与绍伊古会面。
description.en: British politician, former Secretary of State for Defence. Met with Shoigu before the 2022 Russian invasion of Ukraine.

description.zh-cn: 北美洲国家，因俄罗斯入侵乌克兰而对谢尔盖·绍伊古实施制裁。
description.en: A country in North America, which imposed sanctions on Sergey Shoigu due to the Russian invasion of Ukraine.

description.zh-cn: 瓦格纳集团领导人叶夫根尼·普里戈任与俄罗斯国防部长谢尔盖·绍伊古之间的公开权力斗争，最终导致瓦格纳集团叛乱。
description.en: A public power struggle between Wagner Group leader Yevgeny Prigozhin and Russian Minister of Defence Sergey Shoigu, which culminated in the Wagner Group rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯寡头，瓦格纳集团的领导人，曾发动针对俄罗斯国防部的叛乱。
description.en: Russian oligarch, leader of the Wagner Group, who launched a rebellion against the Russian Ministry of Defence.

description.zh-cn: 一家俄罗斯准军事组织，由叶夫根尼·普里戈任领导。
description.en: A Russian paramilitary organization led by Yevgeny Prigozhin.

description.zh-cn: 2023年6月，瓦格纳集团领导人普里戈任发动的针对俄罗斯国防部的武装叛乱。
description.en: In June 2023, an armed rebellion launched by Wagner Group leader Prigozhin against the Russian Ministry of Defence.

description.zh-cn: 位于荷兰海牙的国际司法机构，负责审判犯有种族灭绝罪、危害人类罪、战争罪、侵略罪的个人。
description.en: An intergovernmental organization and international tribunal in The Hague, Netherlands. It has jurisdiction to prosecute individuals for the international crimes of genocide, crimes against humanity, war crimes, and the crime of aggression.

description.zh-cn: 现任摩纳哥亲王，曾与绍伊古和普京一同在图瓦钓鱼。
description.en: The reigning Prince of Monaco, who once went fishing in Tuva with Shoigu and Putin.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯联邦的国歌。
description.en: The national anthem of the Russian Federation.

description.zh-cn: 谢尔盖·绍伊古被认为是俄罗斯总统普京的亲密盟友，属于普京西罗维基核心圈子的成员。
description.en: Sergey Shoigu is considered a close ally of Russian President Vladimir Putin and a member of Putin's siloviki inner circle.

position.zh-cn: 俄罗斯联邦安全会议秘书长
position.en: Secretary of the Security Council of the Russian Federation

description.zh-cn: 在弗拉基米尔·普京总统任内担任俄罗斯联邦安全会议秘书长。
description.en: Serves as the Secretary of the Security Council of the Russian Federation under President Vladimir Putin.

position.zh-cn: 俄罗斯联邦国防部部长
position.en: Minister of Defence of the Russian Federation

description.zh-cn: 在弗拉基米尔·普京总统任内担任俄罗斯联邦国防部部长。
description.en: Served as the Minister of Defence of the Russian Federation under President Vladimir Putin.

description.zh-cn: 谢尔盖·绍伊古接替尼古拉·帕特鲁舍夫，出任俄罗斯联邦安全会议秘书长。
description.en: Sergey Shoigu succeeded Nikolai Patrushev as Secretary of the Security Council of the Russian Federation.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯总统普京建议撤换绍伊古的国防部长职务，并任命其转任联邦安全会议秘书。
description.en: Russian President Putin proposed to replace Shoigu from his position as Minister of Defence and appoint him as Secretary of the Security Council.

description.zh-cn: 安德烈·别洛乌索夫接替谢尔盖·绍伊古，出任俄罗斯联邦国防部部长。
description.en: Andrey Belousov succeeded Sergey Shoigu as Minister of Defence of the Russian Federation.

description.zh-cn: 在阿纳托利·谢尔久科夫因腐败丑闻被解除职务后，谢尔盖·绍伊古被任命为国防部长。
description.en: After Anatoliy Serdyukov was dismissed due to a corruption scandal, Sergey Shoigu was appointed as Minister of Defence.

description.zh-cn: 谢尔盖·绍伊古接替鲍里斯·格罗莫夫，出任莫斯科州州长。
description.en: Sergey Shoigu succeeded Boris Gromov as Governor of Moscow Oblast.

relationships.source: 安德烈·尤里耶维奇·沃罗比约夫

description.zh-cn: 安德烈·尤里耶维奇·沃罗比约夫接替谢尔盖·绍伊古，出任莫斯科州州长。
description.en: Andrey Vorobyov succeeded Sergey Shoigu as Governor of Moscow Oblast.

relationships.target: 俄罗斯联邦紧急情况部
克拉斯诺亚尔斯克理工学院

description.zh-cn: 作为俄罗斯国防部长，谢尔盖·绍伊古是入侵乌克兰行动的关键指挥官之一。
description.en: As the Russian Minister of Defence, Sergey Shoigu was one of the key commanders of the invasion of Ukraine.

description.zh-cn: 乌克兰对谢尔盖·绍伊古提起刑事检控，指控他协助乌克兰东部的非法军事团体。
description.en: Ukraine initiated criminal proceedings against Sergey Shoigu, accusing him of assisting 'illegal military groups' in eastern Ukraine.

description.zh-cn: 因俄罗斯入侵乌克兰，加拿大对谢尔盖·绍伊古实施制裁。
description.en: Canada imposed sanctions on Sergey Shoigu due to the Russian invasion of Ukraine.

relationships.target: 本·华莱士 (英国政治人物)

description.zh-cn: 在俄罗斯入侵乌克兰前夕，时任俄罗斯国防部长绍伊古会见了时任英国国防大臣本·华莱士，并否认了俄罗斯的入侵计划。
description.en: On the eve of the Russian invasion of Ukraine, then-Russian Defence Minister Shoigu met with then-British Defence Secretary Ben Wallace and denied Russia's invasion plans.

description.zh-cn: 瓦格纳集团领导人叶夫根尼·普里戈任与俄罗斯国防部长谢尔盖·绍伊古之间存在公开冲突，普里戈任指责绍伊古意图摧毁瓦格纳军团，并最终发动了瓦格纳集团叛乱。
description.en: Wagner Group leader Yevgeny Prigozhin had a public conflict with Russian Minister of Defence Sergey Shoigu. Prigozhin accused Shoigu of intending to destroy the Wagner legion, which ultimately led to the Wagner Group rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 叶夫根尼·普里戈任是与绍伊古冲突的主要当事人之一。
description.en: Yevgeny Prigozhin was one of the main parties in the conflict with Shoigu.

description.zh-cn: 叶夫根尼·普里戈任以惩罚国防部长绍伊古为由，发动了瓦格纳集团叛乱。
description.en: Yevgeny Prigozhin launched the Wagner Group rebellion to punish Minister of Defence Shoigu.

description.zh-cn: 瓦格纳集团叛乱是针对俄罗斯国防部长谢尔盖·绍伊古和总参谋长瓦列里·格拉西莫夫的武装行动。
description.en: The Wagner Group rebellion was an armed action targeting Russian Minister of Defence Sergey Shoigu and Chief of the General Staff Valery Gerasimov.

description.zh-cn: 国际刑事法院以涉嫌危害人类罪、战争罪等国际罪行，对谢尔盖·绍伊古发出拘捕令。
description.en: The International Criminal Court issued an arrest warrant for Sergey Shoigu for suspected international crimes, including crimes against humanity and war crimes.

description.zh-cn: 谢尔盖·绍伊古曾与普京、摩纳哥亲王阿尔贝二世一同在图瓦钓鱼。
description.en: Sergey Shoigu once went fishing in Tuva with Putin and Albert II, Prince of Monaco.

description.zh-cn: 谢尔盖·绍伊古上任国防部长后，向普京推荐瓦列里·格拉西莫夫出任国防部第一副部长兼俄军总参谋长。
description.en: After becoming Minister of Defence, Sergey Shoigu recommended Valery Gerasimov to Putin for the position of First Deputy Minister of Defence and Chief of the General Staff.

position.zh-cn: 俄罗斯联邦武装力量总参谋长、国防部第一副部长
position.en: Chief of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, First Deputy Minister of Defence

description.zh-cn: 谢尔盖·绍伊古下令指挥官每天早上在军营播放俄罗斯国歌。
description.en: Sergey Shoigu ordered commanders to play the Russian national anthem in barracks every morning.
